title: Trump's Full Inauguration Speech: Border, Gender, Tariff, Inflation, Mars Astronauts, Panama & More
description:
Trump's Full Inauguration Speech: Border, Gender, Tariff, Inflation, Mars Astronauts, Panama & More

In his inaugural address on January 20, 2025, U.S. President Donald Trump laid out a bold vision for his second term, focusing on key issues such as border security, inflation, and economic policies....
